I am Lane Drew, a Ph.D. candidate in Statistics at Colorado State University.

My research interests include Bayesian hierarchical modeling for environmental and ecological applications with an emphasis on record linkage, spatial point processes, and statistical computing.

On this website, you will find a selection of my published works. In addition, you will find news and updates on my current research projects, as well as information on upcoming events and conferences where I will be speaking. 
Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:mail.lanetdrew@gmail.com) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
